title: Companion Approval Guide

In order to make Ethel surrender, you need to damage her enough without killing her. The cutscenes usually procs at around 10-15% health and activates when it is her turn. Auntie Ethel already mentions she has a revive method, so she will still appear in Act 3 even if you kill her.
